name: 7 Years Of Badluck
description:
This is my submission to the Weekly Game Jam- Week 148! It's my first game jam submission and the first game that I can say I "finished" and uploaded.

Hope you enjoy it and please share your thoughts about it. 

Controls are W A S D or Arrow Keys for movement. W/Up/Space to jump. There is double jumping and wall sliding so keep that in mind.

I may possibly create more levels in the future and polish up the game a lot more. Let me know what you think about that! 

Thanks for playing!

The music used was made by https://roboxel.itch.io/creepyscapes 

The character was made by https://dssdiego.itch.io/simple-pixel-art-character

And the tiles used were made by https://twitter.com/metalzebra_
